original_title: Meret Oppenheim - Eine Surrealistin auf eigenen Wegen
overview: A Surrealist on her own Path" - Far more than the furry cup that made her famous is part of the oeuvre of Meret Oppenheim. The documentary presents the multi-faceted work and the brightly colorful life of the great artist and muse of the surrealists, who would have celebrated her 100th birthday on 6 October 2013.
title: Meret Oppenheim - Eine Surrealistin auf eigenen Wegen
